common.title: Auctionviewer
common.meta_description: Auctionviewer is a service which displays Troostwijk auctions on a map to easely find auctions nearby
common.location_warningmessage: All the locations are indications based on the name in the auction. Check the location in the auction to verivy the correct location is shown.
common.retrieving_auctions_error: There went something wrong with retrieving the auctions
common.hosting_expensive_message: The hosting of the api for the auctions was getting to expensive, i am busy to move it, please try again later
common.navigating_to_ikbenhenk: Hi we're back! I have moved everything to my own domain, so that's where you are going now too!
common.navigating_to_ikbenhenk_save: Please save it for the next time ;-)
